title: New: miss t.erner – Starship
content:
Berlin two piece miss t.

erner conjure up an ethereal atmosphere on their debut track Starship that would bring James Blake out in a cold sweat. With the Blake-esque beat rumbling beneath the surface and elegant, ever-so-tender vocals hovering alluring over a refined piano section, it’s a stunning composition. The repeated lyric “I try so hard, that it breaks my heart”, will be echoing around your head for hours after several listens. Whilst I can find no information whatsoever on the duo, aside from the quote on their myspace page – “Miss t.erner is a sound-accoustic marriage between the Berlin based Mr. Terner and Miss T of Sweden”, I’m extremely excited to hear more. Check out Starship below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
